text: Giovanni Sergi Sergas (born 26 April 1959) is an Italian rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Trieste
title: Giovanni Sergi Sergas
